wikipedia_page.main: Claude Ambrose Virgin (8 June 1928 – 1 December 2006) was an American-born British fashion photographer, particularly for British Vogue.He was born in Atlanta, Georgia;Virgin's first wife was Margaret Barch; they had one daughter. His second wife was Jillie Bateman; they had two sons.
